name: Moody Mood Pecker (Verbania Edition)
description:
You play Moody, a semi-blind dog who has the difficult task to fulfill everyone’s need in order to leave Verbania. 

This short game was made during our summer vacation in Verbania, Italy. Seb and I wanted to illustrate our friends and the different places we visited. The main character, Moody, is Julia’s dog and yes, he really is half blind :
